conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Hello, I am calling from the finance agency regarding your loan payment. May I know your current payment status?

conversation.speaker: User
conversation.text: I will be paying my loan day after tomorrow, is it?

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Thank you for letting us know. Could you please confirm the exact date you plan to make the payment?

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Thank you. So, just to confirm, you will be.

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Thank you for that confirmation. We'll look forward to receiving your payment on February 13th, 2026.

conversation.speaker: User
conversation.text: Yes, I will be paying my loan.

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Thank you for confirming that. We appreciate your commitment to make.

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Thank you again for confirming your payment on February 1.

conversation.speaker: AI
conversation.text: Thank you for your time. We appreciate your confirmation and look.

ai_analysis.summary: The AI collection agent contacted the borrower regarding a loan payment. The borrower confirmed they will make the payment on February 13th, 2026.
ai_analysis.sentiment_reasoning: The borrower was cooperative and provided the payment date.
ai_analysis.intent_reasoning: The borrower explicitly stated they will pay and provided a specific date.
